text: Bale da'o, he manabakula, satya tomadera kache paumche geche tomadera para'oyaradegarera tarapha theke. Emana ye ke'u pathe ase sepatha prapta haya sbiya mangalera jan'ya. Ara ye bibhranta ghurate thake, se sbiya amangalera jan'ya bibhranta abasthaya ghurate thakabe. Anantara ami tomadera upara adhikari na'i.
